website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for special occasions, but if you wear false eyelashes frequently, other options on our list are more practical and comfortable.
cons: Not ideal for all occasions or everyday wear

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I live in fake lashes and I love them obnoxious porn star looking. I’ve tried all brands (I can’t do extensions; they make my eyes water like a running faucet), and this is my absolute favorite style and brand. When cared for, I can wear a pair for a week, and that’s 7 days for 12-14 hours with workouts, mom duty, and regular physical chores outside in unfavorable weather. These are thick, long, and give me the barbie look I love. PS- there’s no filter on my photo.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty adhesive
customer_reviews.text: It was raining the day i code to wear these, not like torrential downpour as I live in southern California, but drizzle. They fell off with the moisture. I believe it's a problem with their included adhesive. I am not a fan. Had to scrap them as I was away from home and these do not come with a case, and the tray is the size of a small notebook
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Fake Lashes
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! I purchased these online since I my local stores discontinued them - however, I received counterfeit lashes. I would recommend not wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: xsarai

customer_reviews.title: So durable
customer_reviews.text: Girls, I love my faux lashes. Been through a small army of them. 🤦‍♀️😂 I love light ones, like wispies. My one issue with most lashes is that if you happen to fall asleep in them and you are and xpressive sleeper, they tend to fold and get all wonky. These particular lashes have a wider band, which doesn’t bug me personally. What I love is that I can fall asleep and wake up lashed and gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Love This Look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these lashes! They are so fluffy and gorgeous, very "high end" looking. I'm giving these lashes only 3 stars because I have had 2 of the 6 pairs I've used fall apart when trying to clean them. I get frustrated because they claim these can be used "multiple times", which I know is a very relevant term, but I've only been able to get 2 uses out of these on certain pairs. I think I've only gotten 4 uses out of any pair. Maybe it's user error?
customer_reviews.author: Martinig Gal

customer_reviews.title: Eh. It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: The last band is quite thick, so they are not exactly light weight. These are definitely not for everyday wear, but they're a nice addition for a special event where you want your eyes to have a bit more drama than usual. Probably won't buy another pair like this, but I'll wear them while I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bold eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear at a wedding! I got so many compliments on them and felt beautiful. These are GRAND! They definitely make a statement and are not subtle at all. As other reviewers have mentioned, please purchase a different glue. Mine was completely dried out, couldn't even get a spec of glue out of the bottle. Thank goodness somebody else had a little extra. Overall I am very happy. I would definitely purchase again even with the glue debacle.
customer_reviews.author: Snickle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love it. How did I survive without it so far
customer_reviews.text: love love this Eyelash. I have been repeating my order many times now. Fell in love with this product from the day I got to try a sample they gave out in the Beauty Con Expo. Have bought many Eyelashes online and from different beauty stores but nothing can be compared to this. Also I use one lash about 4 times
customer_reviews.author: Timothy & Amali

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed this time around
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd time ordering these lashes, and I was disappointed this time around. The lashes I received this time aren't nearly as full or dimensional as the previous. It's hard to believe they are the same lashes I've ordered 2 times before. Consistency is key for me, so I'm not sure I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Daily
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the Eylure Vegas Nay Platinum Princess for prices between $11-15 at Walgreens, Target and such stores each pack. I’ve seen claims that these are “fakes” I don’t care if they are or aren’t, they do A HELL of a good job providing an identical match at such a low price ! I wear mine daily and will forever be my faves .
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: They've changed how they make these lashes! They're terrible now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed because these were my favorite strip lashes! The last few packages I purchased are now different than the ones I've been ordering for years. The base of the lashes were thick, durable and kept their shape. Now the base is flimsy and like any cheap grocery store strip lashes. How sad because these were beautiful and could be used several times before they wore off. I had to cancel my subscription for them. I even compared them to old ones I'd saved and yes, very flimsy and cheap looking in comparison. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glamour lashes
customer_reviews.text: I personally loves the Eyelure Fiercely Fabulous Lashes. These are my go to lashes when creating a soft glam or even a smokey glam look. Whatever look you go for I recommend these babies for a final step! Very light weight feel to them, they are easy to apply but reminder, make sure you have enough adhesive on them to keep them set! I made a weather test wearing these while it was windy outside and one almost came off so make sure you have them intact with the adhesive or use an alternative adhesive brand that works for you. All in all they're great lashes!!
customer_reviews.author: Tayy Love

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a pair!!
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite lashes. I have tried so many but never happy with any besides this one. Unfortunately I was buying it from Walmart but for some reason mine doesn't have them anymore so this is my first time buying them from Amazon but needless to say i am going to love them because i have already own so many!!! They are easy to use for beginners and reusable for a few times before you have to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Ashley

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite drug store lashes! Absolutely love these and always get compliments when I wear them. They feel great and light weight. You definitely have to buy these lashes!! Also sold at Target if you don’t want to wait for them to be shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the price of these eyelashes they are a lot cheaper on Amazon. I have purchased these in stores and paid a lot more. However, I am very disappointed in the tiny glue that they included. I tried to use it but the tube was so tiny it barely included any glue. If you purchases these eyelashes you will definitely need to buy a separate adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: BEST LASHES!
customer_reviews.text: If you love thick dramatic lashes, this one is for you. I’ve been using this exact brand and product continuously for the last 4 years and they’ve never disappointed me. I’ve always got compliments on them. For the price they’re such good quality, the lashes are soft as if they’re mink! It’s also a bonus that they’re so cheap here on amazon. Target sells them for $10. I highly reccomend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Best lashes for me !
customer_reviews.text: These are the first lashes I ever wore and when I found them on sale for a REALLY good deal I had to grab them! I bought 5 pair 😂 they came nicely packaged and super fast in def gonna buy more! These lashes are perfect bc I love glam and they're soooo light for being how glam they are and they hold up allll night and day and I love that they're double layered too!!! Perfect glam for me not too much glam just the right amount bc I love for my lashes to pop!
customer_reviews.author: Elayna Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite eyelashes and was very pleased to find them at a great price. They are a lot more expensive when bought in the store. Shipping was on time as usual. Order about 5 pairs for a vacation and did not need that many. Held up great and could reuse easily. Will be buying more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey T.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST EYELASHES!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST eyelash strips! They are great quality and nice and full! They fit well and this a a great price for these! Have purchased multiple times from here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Easy to put on and great for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this Easy to put on and great for a dramatic look I reuse mine at least 10-15 times before retiring them

customer_reviews.title: My fav brand to buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing long lasting if you dont pull the adhesive off. I pulled the adhesive and the lashes unravel
customer_reviews.author: Dainalle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not the real Vegas Nay lashes inside
customer_reviews.text: Got a box the blue Vegas Nay box but the eye lashes are no where close to the store bought real Vegas Nay one. The one I got was not light weight, not fluffy, not anywhere close to the previous Vegas Nay I've have used before. Super disappointed. I could have just went to the store and paid the same amount for the real Vegas Nay lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Nhia Vang

customer_reviews.title: Best lashes, but order different glue!
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite lashes EXCEPT for the glue that is included! This is not the best lash glue. These lashes are amazing but use them with Kiss brand lash adhesive - also sold on Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: *Natural Full Lashes*
customer_reviews.text: *These lashes are SO pretty and are nice and sturdy. They have become my new go to lash!! Just buy them!!*

customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite lashes! I love the way they look!

I look flawless and professional. They look natural. They are lightweight. I get compliments all the time with these lashes. Also, I spend $5.00 more per pair where I purchase them at my local Walgreens.

I would not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lashes
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite lashes from eylure. Nice band and very full. Makes a dramatic difference especially for individuals with larger eyes and/or a round face. The Vegas Nay collection is rival to top brands such as Lily Lashes.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like these at all on me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these at all on me. They aren't very long, but very thick. I wear really long lashes, and these just aren't. They're very thick and pretty, but just too short for my style.

product_meta.title: Eylure Vegas Nay False Eyelashes, Reusable, Adhesive Included, 1 Pair, Cruelty Free
product_meta.description: We aren't saying these false lashes are magic, but they will give your lashes magical length! Absolute Allure are a fabulous, sectional style with a wispy finish. They will add gorgeous definition to your lash look! Follow these easy steps to apply your new fabulous fake lashes: Step 1: Remove the lash from the tray and check fit against the eye Step 2: Apply a thin layer of glue to the lash band Step 3: Using the center of the eye as a guide, apply Step 4: When in place press down lightly Step 5: Enjoy your amazing new look! Precautions: Contains Latex. Stop using this product if you develop redness or itching. In case of eye contact, wash out the eye thoroughly with plenty of clean water. If irritation or redness persists seek medical attention.
feature_bullets: Grand Glamor - An alluring and original lash for full on glamor; make a statement in this beautiful style
Lightweight - Add natural volume to your lashes without weighing down your lids using Eylure natural volume false lashes that feel as light as feathers
No Irritation - Included lash glue is non-irritating and won’t cause itching or puffiness, allowing you to easily wear your lashes all day
Reusable - Eylure fake lashes are reusable, giving you multiple uses and extra value from this pair of stunning lashes
Sleek Band - The thin, sleek black band provides extra definition for a seamless and natural look
